trans-unit.source: Provides methods that help you use X.509 v.3 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 提供協助您使用 X.509 v.3 憑證的方法。

trans-unit.source: ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 的 DER 是由這個類別所支援的唯一憑證格式。

trans-unit.source: For most scenarios, you should use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> class instead.
trans-unit.target: 大部分情況下，您應該使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>類別。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個型別會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> class does not implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method.
trans-unit.target: 以目標應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]及更新版本、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>類別未實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面，並因此不需要`Dispose`方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example loads an X.509 certificate from a file, calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.ToString%2A> method, and displays the results to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會載入 X.509 憑證的檔案，呼叫從<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.ToString%2A>方法，並顯示到主控台的結果。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 的 DER 是由這個類別所支援的唯一憑證格式。

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，包含來自 X.509 憑證的資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> class defined from a sequence of bytes representing an X.509v3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 類別的新執行個體 (這個類別是在表示 X.509v3 憑證的位元組序列中定義的)。

trans-unit.source: ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 的 DER 是由這個類別所支援的唯一憑證格式。

trans-unit.source: If you create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `data`, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`data`、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>簽署存放區的憑證，而不是任何憑證存放區中建立。

trans-unit.source: The following example loads an X.509 certificate file into an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object, exports the certificate as a byte array, and then imports the byte array into another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會載入到 X.509 憑證檔<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>物件，會將憑證匯出為位元組陣列，並再匯入到另一個的位元組陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>物件。

trans-unit.source: A handle to an unmanaged <see langword="PCCERT_CONTEXT" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Unmanaged <see langword="PCCERT_CONTEXT" /> 結構的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> class using a handle to an unmanaged <see langword="PCCERT_CONTEXT" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Unmanaged <see langword="PCCERT_CONTEXT" /> 結構的控制代碼，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>物件控制代碼使用適用於 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API 的憑證內容， `PCCERT_CONTEXT`。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a copy of the certificate context.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立憑證內容的複本。

trans-unit.source: Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released.
trans-unit.target: 不會假設您傳遞至建構函式的內容結構是有效的。都已釋放。

trans-unit.source: You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Handle%2A> property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得一份目前`PCCERT_CONTEXT`結構從<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Handle%2A>屬性，但是它是有效的存留期間只<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>物件。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 物件所使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> class does not implement this interface, and therefore the `Dispose` method does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> 實作<xref:System.IDisposable>開頭的介面[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>類別未實作這個介面，因此`Dispose`方法不存在。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 物件使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> class does not implement this interface, and therefore the `Dispose` method does not exist.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all of the unmanaged resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 使用的所有 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> class does not implement this interface, and therefore the `Dispose` method does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> 實作<xref:System.IDisposable>開頭的介面[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>類別未實作這個介面，因此`Dispose`方法不存在。

trans-unit.target: 要與目前物件比較的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object is equal to the object specified by the <paramref name="other" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Exports the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object to a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 物件匯出至位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> values that describes how to format the output data.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> 值，其描述如何格式化輸出資料。

trans-unit.source: Exports the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object to a byte array in a format described by one of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 以其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 值所描述的格式，將目前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> 物件匯出至位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 位元組的陣列，表示目前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The `contentType` parameter accepts only the following values of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> enumeration: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs12>.
trans-unit.target: `contentType`參數只接受下列值的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>列舉型別： <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs12>。

trans-unit.source: Passing any other value causes a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞任何其他值原因<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following example loads an X.509 certificate file into an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object, exports the certificate as a byte array, and then imports the byte array into another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會載入到 X.509 憑證檔<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>物件，會將憑證匯出為位元組陣列，並再匯入到另一個的位元組陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>物件。

trans-unit.source: A value other than <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert" />, or <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs12" /> was passed to the <paramref name="contentType" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs12" /> 以外的值傳遞至 <paramref name="contentType" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The certificate could not be exported.
trans-unit.target: 無法匯出憑證。

trans-unit.source: for permission to open a key container and export a certificate when you pass the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert" /> value to the <paramref name="contentType" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要開啟的金鑰容器，並匯出憑證，當您將傳遞的權限<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert" />值設定為<paramref name="contentType" />參數。

trans-unit.source: Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified date and time to a string.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的日期和時間轉換成字串。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the value of the <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件之值的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Some cultures cannot convert future dates into strings.
trans-unit.target: 某些文化特性不能將未來的日期轉換成字串。

trans-unit.source: If the expiration date of an X.509 certificate is beyond the range of the culture, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.FormatDate%2A> falls back to a calendar that can express the date.
trans-unit.target: 如果 X.509 憑證的到期日超出範圍的文化特性，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.FormatDate%2A>退而可以用來表示日期的行事曆。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> value is <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>, the calendar is changed to the <xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar> class; otherwise, it is changed to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>值是<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>，行事曆已變成<xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar>類別; 否則它會變更為<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method uses a certificate file (such as a file with a .cer extension) that represents an X.509 certificate, and populates the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object with the certificate that the file contains.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用的憑證檔案 （例如，副檔名為.cer 檔案），代表 X.509 憑證，並於其中填入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate>的憑證，該檔案包含的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example loads an X.509 certificate from a file, calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.ToString%2A> method, and displays the results to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會載入 X.509 憑證的檔案，呼叫從<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.ToString%2A>方法，並顯示到主控台的結果。
